channel.title: SFOL 40: FE Echoes II [4/16] Day 6: A Fallen Field - Tatarrah Wins (And technically the Rigelians and Deliverance too but it's iffy)
channel.description:
# SFOL Echoes II
## Introduction
Welcome to SFOL Echoes!
The foundation of this SFOL is just like all FOLs, with a King, a similar mechanic to Royal Blood, and Conversion. I've done my absolute best to attempt to take even more confirmation from the game as possible, so that abilities become tools for scumreading, not mechanical confirmation in itself. The flavor for this game is taken from one-half of the game **Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia**.
So, here's everything below!
### Co-Host @Blizer
### Rules
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### Gameplay Days will be 3 days long, or shorter if someone is lynched 1st IRL day in 1 day will be the Battle Phase 2nd and 3rd IRL day will be the Lynch Phase Nights will be 1 day long. Actions are done by DMing me. Rigelians will speak in a DM at day and night. Rinea will also speak with the dead through a DM at day and night. All classes can be used, the ones from below. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it When everyone has confirmed, or 24 hours has passed, Day 1 will end
### Executions To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions are done by Trial After the accused posts one message, everyone can begin casting votes King may also Decide Fate during this time Executions end the Day Trials do not extend daytime Okay you know how this works
### Mechanics and Feedback
[quote] :shield: = Unique :crossed_swords: = Guaranteed :fire: = Magical :crown: = Nobility [/quote]
[quote]
#### Characteristics - Unique and Guaranteed are the same as the normal kind that's found on FoL. - There is no bleeding nor poison. - Max cap for non-Unique classes is 3. - Magical is tied to classes that are flavor-wise magic users in Fire Emblem. - Nobility is taken as a modified version from ToL 1.2. - All Nobility gain another secret vote when voting someone else as King, and will only be taken into effect or shown if it actually matters. - The Scum faction (Deliverance) has a member cap of 4.
#### Neighborhoods - Nuibaba and Delthea have access to a neighborhood, in the form of a DM, where they can add and remove people. - NOTE: The neighborhood can only be used at night.
#### Feedback - Feedback is based on the foundation of the limited version from EFOL 1. - Meaning: Players will not know if they are attacked and healed, just healed, empowered, mind warped, and missed, dodged, or survived Day Attacks. - For non-Investigative classes, players will not know if they were occupied, ran into visit prevention, or redirected. - **Basically means that most of the time, there will be a "you slept peacefully" or its easier variant, no feedback at all.**
#### Exceptions - Investigative classes will be given a "no result" from their ability if occupied or visit prevented, and will only be told that they were redirected, not who they were redirected to. - Investigative classes will also get normal feedback from their abilities when not occupied or prevented. - Day Attackers will be told their target did not die for whatever reason. If they do die, well, you'll see it in the thread. - Myrmidons, Python, Tatarrah, and Jedah will only visit their first target, not their second, when forcing players to visit another player. - All players will be told that they were killed, converted, changed classes, put in jail, and connected to the neighborhood.
NOTE: This game is explicitly non-bastard in all types and forms. [/quote]
### Classes
[Kings](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/totally-personal-use/73351/3?u=livicus)
[Rigelians](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/totally-personal-use/73351/4?u=livicus)
[Deliverance](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/totally-personal-use/73351/5?u=livicus)
[Neutrals](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/totally-personal-use/73351/6?u=livicus)
## Specials
### Battles [quote] Starting Day 2, at the start of each day, the [color=brown]Rigelian Army[/color] and the [color=green]Deliverance[/color] will meet to engage in battle. The winning side will gain useful prizes each day that sometimes could swing the tide of the game. All day abilities, including day attacks, can still be used during battles.
This is based off of the classic "Weapon Triangle" from Fire Emblem, where Axes beat Lances, Lances beat Swords, and Swords beat Axes, much like Rock, Paper, Scissors.
[quote] 1. Members of The [color=green]Deliverance[/color] will give a fake claim of what they will choose for the battle the night before: either [color=red]Swords[/color], [color=green]Axes[/color], or [color=blue]Lances[/color]. This will be displayed in bold text alongside some descriptive narrative at the start of the day. 2. The [color=green]Deliverance[/color] will also give the real choice. There may be abilities that a class can use which allows them to choose [color=gray]Bows[/color], forcing a tie the following day regardless of the [color=brown]Rigelians’[/color] choice. 3. There will be 1 day in real time for all alive members to come to a vote in the thread by choosing Swords, Axes, or Lances. Some classes may have special abilities that affect this phase. 4. The [color=green]Deliverance[/color] will come to blows against the [color=brown]Rigelian Army[/color] and the choices of both sides will be revealed. [/quote]
Rigelian Victory: All Rigelians who voted for the winning weapon will gain 1 use of any limited ability of their choice. Some Rigelians may have passives or abilities that further benefit from winning. Deliverance Victory: All Deliverance members will gain 1 use of any limited ability of their choice. Some Deliverance members also have passives or abilities that further benefit from winning. Neutral Draws: In the case of draws or if a majority weapon is not reached, all Neutrals will gain 1 use of any limited ability of their choice. They also have passives or abilities that further benefit from these ties. [/quote]
### Day Attacks
[quote]
Starting Day 2, during the day, some classes will be able to directly attack their targets by using Day Abilities. Unlike night attacks, this will have a result based on RNG. Each different ability has different hit rates, and some classes have passives and abilities that can increase hit rate or decrease hit rate of various players.
The way notifications for Day Attacks work, is anyone who can use a Day Attack will message me the name of their ability in the DM as well as their target, just like a regular ability. I will RNG it and see the result. The person who used the Day Attack as well as the target will get no feedback afterwards, unless one of them ends up dead. Misses, Protection, One-Shot Immunities, all those will give a no result feedback.
The only target Day Attacks may not go for is the King with one exception. Everyone else is fair game.
[/quote]
### Journals Message me your entire journal, putting it in [quote] The last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or whatever you want
### Questions You may ask as many questions as you want in your class card PM only. Questions asked in the thread will not be answered and instead, ignored.
[details="Additional Changes for Echoes II"]
Arcanist and Sky Knight swapped roles Fernand, Berkut, Paladin did a swingy swing ability trade-off Classes have been balanced Alm swapped out True Sacrifice with Falchion Ram’s Banner has been changed Empathetic Noble has been changed Arcanist, Mage, Luthier, Soldier, Forsyth has received Day Attacks in one form or another [/details]
## Classlist: [quote] [color=brown]**Chancellor Desaix**[/color]/[color=green]**King Rudolf**[/color] [color=green]**Clive**[/color] [color=green]**Alm**[/color] [color=brown]**Berkut**[/color] [color=brown]**Fernand**[/color]/[color=brown]**Cavalier**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color]/[color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=brown]**Random Rigelian**[/color]/[color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=gray]**Random Neutral**[/color] [color=gray]**Neutral Killer**[/color] [/quote]
## Players 1. Squid 2. Hjasik :skull: 3. HTM --> Poke :skull: 4. Blue :skull: 5. Geyde :skull: 6. Alice --> Litten 7. Celeste :skull: 8. Luxy :skull: 9. Insanity 10. PKR :skull: 11. Wolfy :skull: 12. Mercenary :skull: 13. Shurian :skull: 14. Marcus --> Mole 15. Math :crown: :skull: 16. Reaper :skull:
### Backups
### Vote-Counters and Specs 1. Captain 2. Nao 3. Twilight
## Graveyard
PKR - [color=brown]**Cavalier**[/color] - Killed N1 Blue - [color=brown]**Berkut**[/color] - Killed D2 Geyde - [color=green]**Clive**[/color] - Lynched D2 Hjasik - [color=gray]**Duma**[/color] - Killed N2 Poke - [color=brown]**Myrmidon**[/color] - Lynched D3 Math - [color=brown]**Desaix**[/color] - Lynched D4 Reaper - [color=brown]**Baron**[/color] - Killed N4 Wolfy - [color=brown]**Cleric**[/color] - Killed N4 Luxy - [color=brown]**Sky Knight**[/color] - Killed D5 Merc - [color=brown]**Desaix**[/color] - Killed D5 Shurian - [color=brown]**Cavalier**[/color] - Lynched D5 Celeste - [color=brown]**Slayde**[/color] - Killed N5
## Survivors Alice/Litten - [color=green]**Clive**[/color] Marcus/Mole - [color=green]**Alm**[/color] Insanity - [color=green]**Mathilda**[/color] Squid - [color=gray]**Tatarrah**[/color]
## Links
[Respawn Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-16-16-day-1-respawn-to-recruit-the-soldier-you-killed/73351/743?u=livicus) [Start of Day 2 - One Lone Scout](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-15-16-day-2-one-dead-pkr-riding-on-a-pony/73351/858?u=livicus) [Fall of the Heir](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-15-16-day-2-one-pkr-doodle-riding-on-a-pony/73351/1220?u=livicus) [Start of Day 3 - Bye Bye Duma](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-12-16-day-3-order-restored/73351/1744?u=livicus) [A Commander's Fall](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-11-16-night-3-myrmidead/73351/2457?u=livicus) [Start of Day 4 - No Deaths](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-11-16-day-4-no-bodies-to-mark-the-fields-with-blood/73351/2460?u=livicus) [Day 6 - The End?](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-40-fe-echoes-ii-4-16-day-6-a-fallen-field/73351/4015?u=livicus)

item.title: SFOL 40: FE Echoes II [4/16] Day 6: A Fallen Field - Tatarrah Wins (And technically the Rigelians and Deliverance too but it's iffy)
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
So,

  1. I did try attacking scum
  2. The King said he was neut and totally didnt make it obvious that he was faking it
  3. Misinterpreted host text; ignore reason why Celeste shouldnt be blacklisted
  4. Then everytime I was online, conversation died or wasn’t necessary to speak.
  5. I had a updating spreadsheet of actions which I was deciding what to do with
  6. I wasn’t an investigative role and I’m a known non-reader where all my reads are inaccurate or false

So how are you leaning towards a Marg Blacklist

Read full topic
